es.unican.meteo.esgf.search

Class SearchResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.unican.meteo.esgf.search.SearchResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Download, java.io.Serializable

    public class SearchResponse
extends java.lang.Object
implements Download, java.io.Serializable

    Class that represents the response of a search.

    Contains metadata for datasets that meet the constraints of a search. Also their corresponding files. For each record will get the record replicas of such records, ie both master records as the record aftershocks. Absolutely all replicas will be of the latest version of the data.

    This some attributes in class is saved in preferences, but can't be saved the attributes: Cache and Executor because they aren't java beans. Thats why their values must be assigned when the main class is created.

    Author:
    Karem Terry
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • startCompleteHarvesting

        public void startCompleteHarvesting()
                             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Starts a complete harvesting of search. Harvest all metadata in ESGF including files and [aggregations (under development)]
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if search already has been harvested in a full harvest or exists a current process of harvest

      • startPartialHarvesting

        public void startPartialHarvesting()
                            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Starts a partial harvesting of search. Only harvest basic metadata to allow download process. Propertys (id, instance_id, index_node, data_node, checksum, checksumType, size), replicas, file y services.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if search already has been harvested in a partial harvest or full harvest or exists a current process of harvest

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
